blocks.content:
Congratulations on completing this journey. Job well done.

You have successfully set up comprehensive PostgreSQL monitoring with Grafana Alloy and Grafana Cloud. This achievement delivers significant value for your database operations and application reliability.

You completed this journey as you:

- Learned about the value of PostgreSQL database monitoring for performance and reliability
- Navigated to the PostgreSQL integration page and selected your platform environment
- Installed Grafana Alloy to collect PostgreSQL metrics and logs
- Prepared PostgreSQL database configuration with a dedicated monitoring user
- Configured Grafana Alloy with PostgreSQL integration snippets
- Tested the connection to verify data collection and transmission
- Installed pre-built dashboards and alert rules for immediate monitoring capabilities
- Explored the PostgreSQL dashboards to understand performance insights and troubleshooting capabilities

blocks.heading: Consider taking the following paths after you complete this journey.
